column3: Did anything change in the C++ standard to require explicitly passing these arguments instead of implicitly by default?\n(or is this just a workaround for a broken compiler?)
Please wait, I'll gmake clean && gmake without the patch :)

Please disregard my patch! I have now compiled&installed&runned bitcoind with both Clang and g++7.\nMy patch sprung from trying to fix build on an older freebsd with older compiler and boost (pre-c++11).
Thanks @lyrra, I'll close this PR then.
Please keep using the fully-qualified name
I think that this is the only valid change right now.\n...\nBut as we use `fprintf` to `stderr` for printing error messages...
